Type Definitions.html#/c:Promise.h@T@Res.name: Resolve
Type Definitions.html#/c:Promise.h@T@Res.abstract: Declaration of the Resolve block, used to resolve a promise with a result.

Type Definitions.html#/c:Promise.h@T@Rej.name: Reject
Type Definitions.html#/c:Promise.h@T@Rej.abstract: Declaration of the Reject block, used to reject a promise with an error.

Type Definitions.html#/c:Promise.h@T@Res.name: Resolved
Type Definitions.html#/c:Promise.h@T@Res.abstract: Declaration of the Resolved block, used to handle the result of a promise.

Type Definitions.html#/c:Promise.h@T@Rej.name: Rejected
Type Definitions.html#/c:Promise.h@T@Rej.abstract: Declaration of the Rejected block, used to handle the rejection of a promise.

Type Definitions.html#/c:Promise.h@T@Exe.name: Executor
Type Definitions.html#/c:Promise.h@T@Exe.abstract: Declaration of the Executor block, used to resolve or reject a promise.

Classes/Promise.html#/c:objc(cs)Promise(.name: executor
Classes/Promise.html#/c:objc(cs)Promise(.abstract: The block to be asynchronously executed that will resolve or reject the promise.

Classes/Promise.html#/c:objc(cs)Promise(.name: resultObservers
Classes/Promise.html#/c:objc(cs)Promise(.abstract: The Resolved blocks to be called when the promise is resolved.

Classes/Promise.html#/c:objc(cs)Promise(.name: errorObservers
Classes/Promise.html#/c:objc(cs)Promise(.abstract: The Rejected blocks to be called when the promise is rejected.

Classes/Promise.html#/c:objc(cs)Promise(.name: result
Classes/Promise.html#/c:objc(cs)Promise(.abstract: The result of the promise in case it has been resolved.

Classes/Promise.html#/c:objc(cs)Promise(.name: error
Classes/Promise.html#/c:objc(cs)Promise(.abstract: The error of the promise in case it has been rejected.

Classes/Promise.html#/c:objc(cs)Promise(.name: -then:
Classes/Promise.html#/c:objc(cs)Promise(.abstract: Calls the provided Resolved block with the result of the promise if it is resolved.

Classes/Promise.html#/c:objc(cs)Promise(.name: -catch:
Classes/Promise.html#/c:objc(cs)Promise(.abstract: Calls the provided Rejected block with an error caused by a rejection of the promise.

Classes/Promise.html#/c:objc(cs)Promise(.name: +all:
Classes/Promise.html#/c:objc(cs)Promise(.abstract: Helper method that executes multiple promises in parallel and returns a Promise that is resolved when all the provided promises have finished executing.

Classes/Observable.html#/c:objc(cs)Obser.name: callbacks
Classes/Observable.html#/c:objc(cs)Obser.abstract: A dictionary that contains all methods to be executed when an event is triggered

Classes/Observable.html#/c:objc(cs)Obser.name: -bind:callback:
Classes/Observable.html#/c:objc(cs)Obser.abstract: Binds to an event by providing a block that will receive the event payload as a parameter.

Classes/Observable.html#/c:objc(cs)Obser.name: -bindSync:callback:
Classes/Observable.html#/c:objc(cs)Obser.abstract: Binds to an event by providing a block that will receive the event payload as a parameter.

Classes/Observable.html#/c:objc(cs)Obser.name: -bindAsync:callback:
Classes/Observable.html#/c:objc(cs)Obser.abstract: Binds to an event by providing a block that will receive the event payload as a parameter and return a Promise that will be resolved asynchronously.

Classes/Observable.html#/c:objc(cs)Obser.name: -unbind:callback:
Classes/Observable.html#/c:objc(cs)Obser.abstract: Unbinds the provided callback from an event.

Classes/Observable.html#/c:objc(cs)Obser.name: -trigger:args:
Classes/Observable.html#/c:objc(cs)Obser.abstract: Triggers the event by calling all its bound callbacks with args as parameters.

Classes/Observable.html#/c:objc(cs)Obser.name: -trigger:
Classes/Observable.html#/c:objc(cs)Obser.abstract: Triggers the event by calling all its bound callbacks.
